line.comment: * Check every tradeable Ware exactly once for a lucrative trade route
* If a route with a proft > profit.min is found, use it
* TODO: Optimize, remove posibillity of selecting an empty ware group
* script call has been updated for LU 1.3.5
* local trader use absolute sector range, UT use relative range
* If trader is UT, use buy station sector for max find range
* script call has been updated for LU 1.3.5
* Amount.extra.hardware is refuelling or buying extra mosq missiles
* therefore this amount musn't be taken into profit calculation!
* Extra check: If sellstation is player-owned and bankrupt, blacklist it
* and search again for a sellstation
* * edit, checking for locked stations instead of blacklisted ones
* * edit, we just did a sector security check, no need to do one again.
* Else it could happen that traders choose the same route when searching
* at the same time. Check ware again!
* if we got here the trade is acceptable, check if it is new best trade
* added selling.rest.ware to return array to let local script know

sval.val: Check every tradeable Ware exactly once for a lucrative trade route
If a route with a proft > profit.min is found, use it
TODO: Optimize, remove posibillity of selecting an empty ware group
script call has been updated for LU 1.3.5
local trader use absolute sector range, UT use relative range
If trader is UT, use buy station sector for max find range
script call has been updated for LU 1.3.5
Amount.extra.hardware is refuelling or buying extra mosq missiles
therefore this amount musn't be taken into profit calculation!
Extra check: If sellstation is player-owned and bankrupt, blacklist it
and search again for a sellstation
* edit, checking for locked stations instead of blacklisted ones
* edit, we just did a sector security check, no need to do one again.
Else it could happen that traders choose the same route when searching
at the same time. Check ware again!
if we got here the trade is acceptable, check if it is new best trade
added selling.rest.ware to return array to let local script know
